cause.description:
Let's kill the word's "hunger" and "thurst", Let's help the people who live it a whole lot worst! - Ryan "mLt^" Mackenzie
We gotta do something...so let's do something!
1. Help Raise money for people who need it more!
2. Bring this world together
3. Let's put an end to poverty!
cause.mission: Raise enough money until the word "Poverty" isn't in the dictionary ANYMORE!
cause.name: mLt^ is putting a stop to POVERTY
